title: [CMI8738-MC6 - C-Media CMI8738] pactl stat failed to find default card

sentences.text: No sounds at all after installing Ubuntu 10.04 LTS (64).
Sounds have been there before, yet not on skype but partly, i.e. no sounds were sent (and no test image in camera.)
AlsaVersion: Advanced Linux Sound Architecture Driver Version 1.0.21.
Card hw:1 'PCH'/'HDA Intel PCH at 0xfa500000 irq 22'
Card hw:2 'U0x46d0x808'/'USB Device 0x46d:0x808 at usb-0000:06:00.0-3, high speed'
Capabilities: cvolume cvolume-joined cswitch cswitch-joined penum
InstallationMedia: Ubuntu 10.04.3 LTS "Lucid Lynx" - Release amd64 (20110720.1)
PactlStatStderr: C o n n e c t i o n   f a i l u r e :   C o n n e c t i o n   r e f u s e d
Title: [CMI8738-MC6 - C-Media CMI8738] pactl stat failed to find default card
dmi.board.asset.tag: To be filled by O.E.M.
in my browsers leads me to a site where I don't know what to do.
How can I download the respective alsa kernel module?
> I see your dmesg has lots of invalid pointer errors.
This looks to be > fixed in later versions of the alsa kernel module: http://git.alsa- > project.org/?p=alsa-
